metaDescription: Leading Exporter & Trader for Agro Commodities in India

hero.title: Welcome To
hero.description1: Galaxy Corporation is one of the leading Exporter & Trader for Agro Commodities in India. The company is exporting agro commodities to customers across the globe. We are located in Pune which is a major business hub for agro commodities. The company deals in a wide range of products such as Oil Seeds, Cereals, Spices, Fresh Vegetable, Fresh Fruits, Frozen Vegetable, Frozen Fruits, Dry Fruits, Pulses, etc.
hero.description2: The core strength of the Company is its strong procurement network, storage, processing, and supply of all agricultural commodities which extends into all important producing centers across India. We have the necessary expertise and backbone to meet any scale of demand for agricultural commodities.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We combine decades of agricultural expertise with modern trade practices to deliver exceptional value to our global partners.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Serving customers across continents with reliable export services and extensive international trade network.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Stringent quality control at every step ensures premium grade products that meet international standards.

fastEfficient.title: Fast & Efficient
fastEfficient.description: Streamlined logistics and documentation processes ensure timely delivery and smooth customs clearance.

competitivePricing.title: Competitive Pricing
competitivePricing.description: Direct sourcing from farmers and bulk processing capabilities allow us to offer the best market rates.

products.title: Our
products.subtitle: We export premium quality agricultural commodities across a wide range of categories to meet global demand.
